strings.Value: "Good day, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! I received a curious reminder of my status as court artisan. A few preachers visited my workshop, praising you and expressing their gratitude for the warm welcome they've received in your lands. After they left, I decided to make a contribution to our common cause."

"Greetings!" {n}Sharel blushes slightly.{/n} "There are so many arcanists and priests in the {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} now â€“ many of them new customers. I've had a lot of commissions recently, and my techniques have improved with the practice. I'd be happy to share the results with you."
"Here's a special gift for you, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. I hope it will prove useful!"
